attributes.additional_details: We, the people of Great Britain wish for the poppy to be preserved and made the official national flower of remembrance, so that all future generations can use the poppy as a mark of national remembrance, grieving and love for those killed in action, during past present and future conflicts of war. We want the poppy to be protected and for it to be recognised by all nations that it is protected. We your subjects want the poppy to be placed as a International symbol of remembrance but for the British Government to recognise and respect the importance of the poppy in British Heritage and 'Lest We Forget' the importance of our men and women serving for queen and country
